attributes.action: I would like NHS to start funding areola tattooing after breast cancer
attributes.additional_details: Ive contacted the NHS with no joy to get these survivors the treatment they rightfully deserve funded. I have many ladies come to my clinic that I fund myself with faded, un even, unrealistic areola tattoos. I’m so busy helping these ladies which I won’t stop doing however it is effecting my income as it seems it’s becoming much more frequent for ladies to visit our clinics as apposed to nurses due to the results being so unprofessional. If we are funded by the NHS this will not be a problem.
attributes.background: To discuss the fact that nurses are tattooing with semi permanent pigments that simply do not last Therefor the patient is having to relive the final steps of a traumatic journey time after time.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about NHS care for patients are a matter for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.
